alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 7:30PM CDT until May 22 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 730 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Perryton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Perryton and Wolf Creek Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
